channel.title: Borderlands to Axoloti
channel.description: Hi, has anyone used the app borderlands granular to midi control a patch on axoloti? Any advice on the hookup? I see in @janvantomme book it talks about using the iPad as a midi device but just wondering if this particular app has had any success for anyone. Thanks!

item.title: Borderlands to Axoloti
item.dc:creator: @dungeontroll666 Spencer J Salmon
item.description:
@dungeontroll666 wrote:

Thanks for your input that helps alot!

Read full topic

item.title: Borderlands to Axoloti
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

Check the settings of the app if you can set the MIDI output channel.

Any iPad app that has MIDI out should work with the Axoloti.

Read full topic
